novaLaunch.whatWillHappen: When you click on "LAUNCH!" below the following will happen:
novaLaunch.signUpPageRemoved: The sign up page will be disabled, making the full website accessible to visitors.
novaLaunch.extraActions: Extra actions will be executed based on the configuration.
novaLaunch.redirectedAndPluginDisabled: You will be redirected to the admin dashboard and this plugin will be disabled.
novaLaunch.confirmWithPassword: Please enter your password to authorize the launch:
